PackageOracle.name: DA_SALES_TRANS_LINE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SALES_TRANS_LINE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.597503000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_trans_id IN VARCHAR2
,sales_trans_line_id IN VARCHAR2
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,unit_selling_price_amt IN NUMBER
,promotion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sales_rep_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_trans_id IN VARCHAR2
,sales_trans_line_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_sales_trans_line;

body.name: DA_SALES_TRANS_LINE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SALES_TRANS_LINE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.15.608008000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_trans_id IN VARCHAR2
,sales_trans_line_id IN VARCHAR2
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,offering_cd IN VARCHAR2
,item_qty IN NUMBER
,unit_selling_price_amt IN NUMBER
,promotion_cd IN VARCHAR2
,sales_rep_party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_trans_line.add, parms=' || sales_trans_id || '|' || sales_trans_line_id || '|' || offering_id || '|' || offering_cd || '|' || item_qty || '|' || unit_selling_price_amt || '|' || promotion_cd || '|' || sales_rep_party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_sales_trans_line a
(
a.sales_trans_id
,a.sales_trans_line_id
,a.offering_id
,a.offering_cd
,a.item_qty
,a.unit_selling_price_amt
,a.promotion_cd
,a.sales_rep_party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.sales_trans_id
,add.sales_trans_line_id
,add.offering_id
,add.offering_cd
,add.item_qty
,add.unit_selling_price_amt
,add.promotion_cd
,add.sales_rep_party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_trans_line.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,sales_trans_id IN VARCHAR2
,sales_trans_line_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sales_trans_line.del, parms=' || sales_trans_id || '|' || sales_trans_line_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_sales_trans_line a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.sales_trans_id = del.sales_trans_id
AND a.sales_trans_line_id = del.sales_trans_line_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sales_trans_line.del');

END del;

END da_sales_trans_line;
